title: Video: Midi Matilda – Love & The Movies
body:
**Midi Matilda** have that irresistible knack for writing addictive sugary sweet pop tracks, and there’s fewer better then them around at this moment in time.

Like a collision between **M83** and **The Killers**, they’re joyous, ever-so remorseful and begging for a warm summers day to let them in. **Midi Matilda** may well be the soundtrack to the summer that we’re so long overdue. Check out new single **Love & The Movies** below, as well as it’s beautifully shot video.
